Magic Notes:
Elemental Affinity: +2 HP ancestry damage type on spells
Font Of Magic: May use 10 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Heightened Spell: May spend 3 Sorcery Points to inflict target Disadv on spell save
Quickened Spell: May spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast a spell as bonus action
Twinned Spell: May spend spell level Sorcery Points to add a second spell target
